Function	Involved in early stages of the homologous recombination repair (HRR) pathway of double-stranded DNA breaks arising during DNA replication or induced by DNA-damaging agents. Required for meiotic progression, hence for fertility (PubMed:32719396, PubMed:33713115, PubMed:34402903).
